inclusion.criterion: apartment can accommodate the device EzyGain
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: first visit takes place on site with the investigator / APA investigator and an investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of the spontaneous physical activity of the patient by actimetry for seven days + QAPPA (questionnaire of physical activity for old person)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: beginning of the training phase on the device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: each patient performs a minimum of 3 sessions per week with the investigator / APA investigator, for 4 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of the spontaneous physical activity of the patient by actimetry for seven days QAPPA (questionnaire of physical activity for elderly person) a week and a month after the training phase of four weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: availability at home during their participation period (walking exercise weeks + physical activity assessment weeks)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient with a volunteer close caregiver to participate in the study and receive training from the investigator/APA investigator and then manage autonomy sessions
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: person who would like to train more regularly in the walk and at home because unable to get out
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man with Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has an IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age, and a random GH level of 4 ug/L.
